title: TOWIE's Courtney Green 'will be bridesmaid' at Shelby Tribble and Sam Mucklow's wedding
text:

The Only Way Is Essex's Courtney Green has stated that she will be a bridesmaid at her pal Shelby Tribble's wedding to Sam Mucklow.

The reality TV star, 24, whose friendship with former promotional model Shelby has been documented on the ITVbe series, announced her special role only hours after Sam announced he had popped the question to his girlfriend.

Sam, who has been dating Shelby since the summer, unveiled his intentions to walk his sweetheart down the aisle on Saturday night with cheeky Instagram post of the lovebirds kissing.

Hunk Sam asked his legion of admirers and TOWIE friends who was going to be coming to the wedding.

Alongside the messages of congratulations, Courtney penned: "I’m bridesmaid !!!"

Shelby has yet to break her silence on the engagement.

(Image: Mike Raison)

The Mirror have approached Shelby Tribble's representatives for further comment.

It rings true that one wedding follows another as their co-star Olivia Attwood has just got engaged to her footballer boyfriend Bradley Dack.

However, it seems to have been on the cards for awhile for Sam and Shelby.

Sam has hinted he could see a future with Shelby as he said he was ready to "wind down", live with her and have kids.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

He told Metro: “I’m 27 now, Shelby’s 27 and I want to wind down and calm down. I want to live with her.

“I want to have kids soon and I see that with Shelby. She’ll be such a good mum. She’s great with my nephews, you should see her with them.

"We've spent the whole summer together in Spain, she’s been with my family and my sisters and everyone just loves her."

Shelby echoed her love's sentiments when she freely expressed her interest in starting a family and getting married to Sam.

(Image: Instagram)

She said: "For me personally we think about having babies, marriage. He’s got so many qualities that I love in a man and I know that he will make a great partner and dad because of how he is with me. " The couples relationship has taken a complete U-turn after scenes were aired on TOWIE showing the pair embroiled in a furious row in Thailand.

Their spat led to the former promotional model throwing a drink at the hunk.

In retaliation the livid star called his now fiancée “a slag”.

However, in months that followed, the couple found themselves back in each other's arms.
description: The TOWIE beauty has shared that she will be on hand to help the bride-to-be on her big day
